esema dewana thattuwe di eeespi ge muhuna diha balagena siti miyagiya thanaththa thallu karanna epayayi ki bawath ee awasthawe eeespi wisin age samiya thallu kala bawa ema sakkiyen kiya athi bawada nithignya pe්ramarathna mahadhikarana winisuruwariyage awadhanayata yomu kalaya.kolambaa adhikarana waidya niladhari wisheshagnya waidya ajith thennakon, waidya uthpala aatigala saha waidya asela mendis yana waidyawaru samanga pawathwu dewana pashchath marana parikshanaye di da, sakkikariya kiyana aakaraye paharadimaka thuwala athi bawak sandahanwa nathi bawa kiweya.

nathangen dawith rajuta paniwudayak (1 wansha: 17:1-15) 1 dawith rajuge siyalu sathurangen samindanan wahanse ohuta hama athin ma nidahasa dun pasu, ohu siya niwesehi wasaya kele ya. 2 ese sitina athara rajathuma nathan nam diwasiwarayata katha kota, ”menna, mama dan kihiri geyaka wasami; eheth, dewiyan wahansege giwisum karanduwa kudaramak athule thibe ya”yi kiwe ya. 3 ewita nathan pilithuru demin, ”oba gos obe sithe thibena siyalla karanna; manda, samindanan wahanse oba samanga wada sitina seka”yi rajuta kiwe ya. 4 thawada, ema rathriye samindanan wahansege paniwudaya nathan wetha paminiye ya. 5 un wahanse mese wadala seka: ”numbaa gos, samindanan wahanse mese kiyana seka yi mage mehekaru wana dawithta kiyanna: 6 ‘mage wasasthanaya sandaha mata maligawak godanangannata yanne numbaa da?

emenma danumen saha gunayen piripun daru pirisak bihikirimata rajaya gena yana wadapiliwele di widuhalpathiwarun, guruwarun menma adala siyalu parshwayan sidukarana kapawima da mehidi janadhipathithumage agayimata lakwiya.
me atharathuradi nagaraye minimarumak sidu weyi.
me harennata ranil jayalath athadanguwata ganima sandaha wiwrutha warenthuwak athi bawa da kiyathi.
witeka me wiharasthanaye wada siti swamin wahanse thunnamakage katata siwuru oba wiharasthanaya idiripita siyambaala gase ella thibe.
eka ma sansiddhi samuhayak sandaha wiwidha wigraha isiripath kala haki ya.
thamange kudu bawama misa wiwechanayaka pa්ramodaya denna asamath wemin yanawa.
kese wuwada mathupita paswala mati pramanaya anuwa bandun mishranaya sandaha bhawitha karanu labana wali saha kompost pramanaya wenas karaganna.
balanna, nawaththanna issarawela dumriyakata godawenawa kiyala kiyanne monatharam anuwana wadakda?
aran dila tikadawasak giyahama wena ekak illanawa.
